column2: this is where we parted ways. Her evening progressed with the DIY hot rock waygu beef
column4: and sasami yaki (oak-grilled chicken breast with lemongrass/cilantro). All were described as tasty - the chicken melted in her mouth in a non-creepy way - but perhaps the flavors needed to be kicked up a notch
column7: who rejected the leftover chicken I attempted to feed him when we arrived home.
